item.title: International Scholars Inc.
item.description: The WhatsApp Intergration From the example, it seems what we essentially need to do is create and deploy an app that would schedule and send reminders to complete an application to applicants. To send the reminders, we use Twilio, with Python & Flask. In this case, we don’t really need a webapp since we’re not planning to respond to any messages for now. We also need to somehow import data from the Excel sheet and add it to a database.
